steps.name: Кнопка видна и клик по ней

parameters.name: element
parameters.value: <button aria-pressed="true" autocomplete="off" class="Button2 Button2_checked Button2_size_l Button2_view_default" data-t="button:default" data-type="login" type="button">Почта</button>

parameters.name: element
parameters.value: <input aria-invalid="false" autocapitalize="off" autocomplete="username" autocorrect="off" class="Textinput-Control" data-t="field:input-login" dir="ltr" id="passp-field-login" name="login" placeholder="Логин или email" type="text" value></input>
